What.Text: Yea I think thats ok, roll with it!
Not sure about that one... Maybe think of something else?
My Mind is too hazy right now. Ask me later.

When.Text: I say whenever you want it to happen. Go with it!

How.Text: I think this can be done if you get your friends to help you out too ^.^

Where.Text: Sorry, im dreaming of a very nice and tasty pizza. What did you ask again?

Why.Text: Because your generally a very good person :D
Because you touch yourself at night while crying to sleep, don't you?

Which.Text: It should be that one sitting on the table
You and I both know which one its going to be...
For an example response, Im pretty happy with how Meef managed to come up with all this. Wait what did you ask?
